00020 
00022 class DynamicTrigger
00023 {
00024 private:
00026   DynamicTrigger(const DynamicTrigger&);
00027 public:
00028 
00032   D_DATA(int sanity_check);
00033 
00036   AbstractConstraint* constraint;
00038   int _trigger_info;
00039 
00040   DynamicTrigger* prev;
00041   DynamicTrigger* next;
00042 
00044   int& trigger_info()
00045   { return _trigger_info; }
00046 
00047 
00048 #ifdef BTWLDEF
00049 private:
00050   DynamicTrigger* basequeue;
00051 public:
00052   DynamicTrigger* getQueue()
00053   { return basequeue; }
00054 
00055   void setQueue(DynamicTrigger* ptr)
00056   { basequeue = ptr; }
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 
00060   DynamicTrigger(AbstractConstraint* c) : constraint(c), prev(NULL), next(NULL)
00061 #ifdef BTWLDEF
00062   , basequeue(NULL)
00063 #endif
00064   { D_DATA(sanity_check = 1234);}
00065 
00066   DynamicTrigger() : constraint(NULL)
00067   {
00068     D_DATA(sanity_check = 1234);
00069     prev = next = this;
00070   }
00071 
00072   friend void releaseTrigger(StateObj* stateObj, DynamicTrigger* trig BT_FUNDEF);
00073 private:
00075   void remove(DynamicTrigger*& next_queue_ptr)
00076   {
00077     if(this == next_queue_ptr)
00078     {
00079       CON_INFO_ADDONE(DynamicMovePtr);
00080       next_queue_ptr = next;
00081     }
00082     D_ASSERT(constraint != NULL);
00083     D_ASSERT(sanity_check == 1234);
00084     D_ASSERT( (prev == NULL) == (next == NULL) );
00085     DynamicTrigger* old_prev = prev;
00086     DynamicTrigger* old_next = next;
00087     if(old_prev != NULL)
00088     { old_prev->next = old_next; }
00089     if(old_next != NULL)
00090     { old_next->prev = old_prev; }
00091     D_ASSERT(old_prev == NULL || old_prev->sanity_check_list(false));
00092     D_ASSERT(old_next == NULL || old_next->sanity_check_list(false));
00093     next = NULL;
00094     prev = NULL;
00095   }
00096 public:
00097   inline bool isAttached()
00098   {
00099       return prev!=NULL;
00100   }
00101 
00102 private:
00103    void add_after_implementation(DynamicTrigger* new_prev, DynamicTrigger*& next_queue_ptr)
00104    {
00105        if(prev != NULL)
00106        {
00107     #ifndef NO_DYN_CHECK
00108          if(this == next_queue_ptr)
00109          {
00110            CON_INFO_ADDONE(DynamicMovePtr);
00111            next_queue_ptr = next;
00112          }
00113 
00114     #endif
00115          remove(next_queue_ptr);
00116        }
00117        DynamicTrigger* new_next = new_prev->next;
00118        prev = new_prev;
00119        next = new_next;
00120        new_prev->next = this;
00121        new_next->prev = this;
00122        D_ASSERT(prev->next == this);
00123        D_ASSERT(next->prev == this);
00124        D_ASSERT(new_prev->sanity_check_list());
00125    }
00126 public:
00129   // next_queue_ptr is a '*&' as it is a pointer which we want a reference to, so we can change it!
00130   void add_after(DynamicTrigger* new_prev, DynamicTrigger*& next_queue_ptr)
00131   {
00132     D_ASSERT(constraint != NULL);
00133     D_ASSERT(sanity_check == 1234);
00134     D_ASSERT(new_prev->sanity_check_list());
00135     add_after_implementation(new_prev, next_queue_ptr);
00136   }
00137 
00139 
00140   void propagate();
00141 
00142   ~DynamicTrigger()
00143   {
00144       D_ASSERT(sanity_check == 1234);
00145       D_DATA(sanity_check = -1);
00146   }
00147 
00148   BOOL sanity_check_list(BOOL is_head_of_list = true)
00149   {
00150     if(is_head_of_list)
00151     {
00152       D_ASSERT(this->constraint == NULL);
00153     }
00154     D_ASSERT(this->sanity_check == 1234);
00155     for(DynamicTrigger* it = this->next; it != this; it = it->next)
00156     {
00157       D_ASSERT(it->sanity_check == 1234);
00158       if(is_head_of_list)
00159       {
00160         D_ASSERT(it->constraint != NULL);
00161       }
00162       D_ASSERT(it->prev->next == it);
00163       D_ASSERT(it->next->prev == it);
00164     }
00165     return true;
00166   }
00167 };
